Package org.eclipse.persistence.jpa.jpql.tools.model

Enum IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle>
      • org.eclipse.persistence.jpa.jpql.tools.model.IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle>
    Enclosing interface:
    IJPQLQueryFormatter
    public static enum IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle
extends java.lang.Enum<IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle>
    This enumeration determines how the JPQL identifiers are formatted when written out.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      CAPITALIZE_EACH_WORD
      The JPQL identifiers are written out the first letter being uppercase and the rest being lower case.
      LOWERCASE
      The JPQL identifiers are written out with lowercase letters.
      UPPERCASE
      The JPQL identifiers are written out with uppercase letters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String capitalizeEachWord​(java.lang.String identifier)
      Returns the given JPQL identifier with the first letter of each word capitalized and the rest being lower case.
      java.lang.String formatIdentifier​(java.lang.String identifier)
      Formats the given JPQL identifier, if it needs to be decorated with more information.
      static IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle valueOf​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

        public static final IJPQLQueryFormatter.IdentifierStyle CAPITALIZE_EACH_WORD

      • capitalizeEachWord

        public java.lang.String capitalizeEachWord​(java.lang.String identifier)
        Returns the given JPQL identifier with the first letter of each word capitalized and the rest being lower case.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The JPQL identifier to format
        Returns:
        The formatted JPQL identifier

      • formatIdentifier

        public java.lang.String formatIdentifier​(java.lang.String identifier)
        Formats the given JPQL identifier, if it needs to be decorated with more information. Which depends on how the string is created.
        Parameters:
        identifier - JPQL identifier to format
        Returns:
        By default the given identifier is returned
